body:
I can't seem to find the build log and environment files, if someone could help me locate them that would be great :) 

I am trying to build the blitz++ library and running into the error below:

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
(base) arjun@arjun-Mechanical-Engineering-UCB:~$ spack install blitz
==> Installing blitz-1.0.1-25uinlw6rrvduppjlybv3sqjvbqw46wo
==> No binary for blitz-1.0.1-25uinlw6rrvduppjlybv3sqjvbqw46wo found: installing from source
==> Fetching https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/_source-cache/archive/b6/b62fc3f07b64b264307b01fec5e4f2793e09a68dcb5378984aedbc2e4b3adcef.tar.gz
######################################################################### 100.0%
==> blitz: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> blitz: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> blitz: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j8' 'lib'
See build log for details:
```

### Information on your system

```
(base) arjun@arjun-Mechanical-Engineering-UCB:~$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-278-093a247b2
* **Python:** 3.7.4
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake
* **Concretizer:** original
```

### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [spack-build-out.txt]()
* [spack-build-env.txt]()

<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x ] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x ] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x ] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: blitz
